channel.title: Emps-World
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/3tO0IxW.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Uo6nBZs.png[/img]
Emps-World is a 317 server loading higher revision data. We use an improved game engine (LWJGL library) which makes the client more stable and faster.
We update the server and bring new quality content on a weekly basis. The game itself has a balanced combat triangle and challenging experience rates.
Communication is as important as updating the server. Therefore we let the community participate in future updates to make the game enjoyable for everyone.
Still not convinced? Visit our [URL=http://emps-world.net/]homepage[/URL], check out the [URL=http://emps-world.net/forum/index.php?board=2.0]updates[/URL], [URL=http://emps-world.net/register]create an account[/URL] and convince yourself!
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/w9dbj8e.png[/img]
[SIZE=5]20 Skills Castle-Wars Multiple Worlds Highscores Perfect Animations Shooting Star Godwars Dungeon Combat Triangle Quests Clan Chat Pest Control Warriors Guild Brimhaven Agility Course Perfect Clipping Systems Duel Arena Barrows Fight Pits Many Bosses Full Music And Sound System Active Community[/SIZE][SIZE=4] [URL=http://emps-world.net/wiki]& much more![/URL][/SIZE]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/UygLAQj.png[/img]
[IMG]http://emps-world.net/img/screenshots_large/pc1.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://emps-world.net/img/screenshots_large/drop_party.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://emps-world.net/img/screenshots_large/gwd.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://emps-world.net/img/updates/revenants.jpg[/img][/CENTER]
